channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8461] Make Vectorized Decimal query results match Non-Vectorized query results with respect to trailing zeroes... .0000
item.summary: Make Vectorized Decimal query results match Non-Vectorized query results with respect to trailing zeroes... .0000

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
